titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-03-17T15:09-0500

change.item: Revised by Erika Gottfried to reflect addition of materials.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

physdesc.extent: in one manuscript box and one oversized box

did.abstract: Morris Rosenzweig was the comptroller of District 65/United Automobile Workers. This collection contains clippings, booklets, buttons, photographs, artifacts, ephemera and a typescript on the history of District 65 written by Morris Rosenzweig.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by Morris Rosenzweig are held by his son Sheldon Rosenzweig. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting Sheldon Rosenzweig.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist, materials are in the order in which they were received from the donor.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Morris Rosenzweig Papers; WAG 273; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Donated by Sheldon Rosenzweig (son) in 2008 and 2015. The accession numbers 2008.004 and 2015.013 are associated with this gift.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains clippings, booklets, buttons, photographs, newspapers, artifacts (jacket, caps, luggage tag), ephemera and a typescript on the history of District 65 written by Morris Rosenzweig.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Morris Rosenzweig was the comptroller of District 65/United Automobile Workers.

controlaccess.corpname: International Union, United Automobile, Aerospace, and Agricultural Implement Workers of America. District 65.
United Automobile, Aircraft, and Vehicle Workers of America. District 65.
